title: Compensation
context: §11-42 Compensation. Members of the boards of registration shall be compensated pursuant to a schedule established by the chief election officer. The schedule shall be contained in rules adopted pursuant to chapter 91. [L 1970, c 26, pt of §2; am L 1979, c 133, §1; am L 1987, c 210, §1; am L 1998, c 56, §1] Cross References Precinct officials&rsquo; compensation, see §11-76.
